8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ubaidullah (bin Muslim) Al-Qurashi narrated from his father who said:"I asked - or; the Prophet was asked - about fasting daily. So he said: 'Your family has a right over you.' Then he said: 'Fast Ramadan and that which is after it, and every Wednesday and Thursday. If you do that, then you will have fasted daily, as well as broken (the fast)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَوْمِ يَوْمِ الأَرْبِعَاءِ وَالْخَمِيسِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Fasting On Wednesday and Thursday
